Index.meta_title: SaaS Template - The perfect SaaS template to build and scale your business with ease.
Index.meta_description: A free and open-source landing page template for your SaaS business, built with React, TypeScript, Shadcn UI, and Tailwind CSS.

FAQ.question: What is this SaaS boilerplate?
FAQ.answer: This is a modern, full-stack SaaS boilerplate built with Next.js, featuring authentication, multi-tenancy, billing integration, and internationalization. It provides a solid foundation for building scalable SaaS applications with best practices and modern technologies.

CTA.title: Ready to build your SaaS?
CTA.description: Get started with our production-ready boilerplate and launch your SaaS application faster than ever.
